thread.title: Beth Rutter

author: Beth Rutter
title: Beth Rutter
text: I thought this was the best thing for me to do because it's so much easier than going through a dealership or through a website. I got more than what my car was even worth, which I thought was awesome! I will recommend this to everyone and definitely use this company again. Also, Mitch, the man who helped me out, was the best! He really informed me on things I didn't even know was wrong with my car and was willing to stay after the office hours to help me out.
